named-query.name: ALBUM_LIST_SELECT_BY_CUSTOMER
named-query.query: select o from YalbumImpl as o where o.customer.uidPk = ?1 and o.deleteStatus = '1'

named-query.name: PERSON_INFO_LIST_SELECT_BY_USER
named-query.query: select p from PersonInfo as p where p.user.userId = ?1

named-query.name: ALBUM_LIST_SELECT_BY_NAME_UID
named-query.query: select o from YalbumImpl as o where o.albumName = ?1 and o.customer.uidPk = ?2 and o.deleteStatus = '1'

named-query.name: COUNT_ALBUM_IN_CUSTOMER
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(o.uidPk) FROM YalbumImpl as o where o.customer.uidPk = ?1 and o.deleteStatus = '1'

named-query.name: COUNT_ALBUM_IN_CUSTOMER_ALBUMNAME
named-query.query: SELECT COUNT(o.uidPk) FROM YalbumImpl as o where o.customer.uidPk = ?1 and o.albumName = ?2 and o.deleteStatus = '1'

named-query.name: IMAGE_LIST_SELECT_BY_RANGE
named-query.query: select o from YimageImpl as o where o.uidPk >= ?1 and o.uidPk < ?2 order by o.uidPk ASC

named-query.name: IMAGE_LIST_SELECT_BY_GUIDLIST_CREATETIME
named-query.query: select o from YimageImpl as o where o.guid in (:list) and o.insTime > :param_latestDate

named-query.name: IMAGE_SELECT_BY_GUID
named-query.query: select o from YimageImpl as o where o.guid = ?1

named-query.name: IMAGE_LIST_SELECT_BY_ALBUM
named-query.query: select r.image from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: COUNT_IMAGE_IN_ALBUM
named-query.query: select COUNT(r.uidPk) from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: ALBUMIMAGE_SELECT_BY_ALBUM_IMAGE
named-query.query: select r from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.uidPk = ?1 and r.image.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: ALBUMIMAGE_SELECT_BY_NOT_ALBUM_IMAGE
named-query.query: select r from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.uidPk <> ?1 and r.image.uidPk = ?2

named-query.name: ALBUMIMAGE_SELECT_BY_ALBUM_ID
named-query.query: select r from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.uidPk = ?1

named-query.name: IMAGE_LIST_SELECT_BY_ALBUM_NAME
named-query.query: select r.image from YalbumimagesImpl as r where r.album.albumName = ?1
